comments.body:
Could you add at the top of Apply the following line. This will create an ems log event for users with auto support turned on.

netapp_utils.ems_log_event("na_ontap_ldap", self.server)

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +197,201 @@    def apply(self):
        '''Call create/modify/delete operations.'''
        current = self.get_ldap()
        cd_action = self.na_helper.get_cd_action(current, self.parameters)
        modify = self.na_helper.get_modified_attributes(current, self.parameters)
